pageProps.title: The Struggles of Boys and Men in Today's Society: Understanding the Challenges and Seeking Solutions
pageProps.metaDesc: In recent times, the topic of boys and men has become increasingly complex and controversial. While efforts to address the historical gender disparities faced by girls and women have been successful, the unintended consequence has been the neglect of the challenges faced by boys and men. This article aims to shed light on the struggles faced by males in various aspects of society, including education, employment, and family dynamics. By examining the existing gender gaps and exploring potential solutions, we can work towards a more inclusive and equitable future for all.
